sentences.en: A milky mist filled the valley.
sentences.cn: 白蒙蒙的薄雾弥漫山谷。

sentences.en: A milky twilight crept about the stairway and the landings below.
sentences.cn: 乳白的黄昏蹑进楼梯和下面的楼梯口.

sentences.en: Alexander always has milky coffee at lunchtime.
sentences.cn: 亚历山大总是在午餐时喝掺奶的咖啡.

sentences.en: And into that lake flowed a small stream, the water of which was not milky.
sentences.cn: 而且,还有一条小溪通到湖里, 溪水不是白茫茫的.

sentences.en: Bill staggered on through the milky water.
sentences.cn: 比尔在白茫茫的河水里一摇一晃地走着.

sentences.en: He reached for it with both hands and stirred up the milky mud at the bottom.
sentences.cn: 于是他用双手去捉,把池底的乳白色泥浆全搅浑了.

sentences.en: He was put on a diet of milky food.
sentences.cn: 他按照医嘱要食用乳制品。

sentences.en: He was sitting at the big table cradling a large bowl of milky coffee.
sentences.cn: 他坐在一张大桌子旁，手里捧着一大碗加了牛奶的咖啡。

sentences.en: Her face had turned a milky yellow colour.
Her face had turned a milky yellow.
I like a hot milky drink at bedtime.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢睡前喝杯热奶饮料.

sentences.en: One of them scooped up a water chestnut, still tiny and milky white.
sentences.cn: 顺手从水里捞上一棵菱角来, 菱角还很嫩很小,乳白色.

sentences.en: The coelomic fluid is a milky white liquid.
We couples who have been separated hate the ruthless " The Milky Way ".
sentences.cn: 我们这些牛郎织女都恨透了那条无情的 “ 天河 ”.

words.tran_cn: 挤奶女工；在牛奶场工作的女工
牛奶商；送奶工人；挤奶员工
乳白的,像牛奶的,浊白的,混浊不清的

trans.tran_cn: 像牛奶的，乳白色的，浑浊的，柔弱的，（食品）加了牛奶的，（植物）分泌乳汁的
